com.siperian.bdd.userexits.operations

Interface ISaveOperationPlugin

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IBaseOperationPlugin
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    ISendForApproveOperationPlugin, ITaskOperationPlugin

    public interface ISaveOperationPlugin
extends IBaseOperationPlugin

    Defines the user exits for the Save operation.

    Defines two additional properties for the OperationContext:

    INTERACTION_ID - SIF client interaction id

    SAVE_IN_PENDING_STATE - indicates whether data is saving in "pending" state

    OperationType should be set to SAVE_OPERATION.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String INTERACTION_ID
      OperationContext property that defines SIF interaction ID.
      static OperationResult NEED_REFRESH_OBJECT
      Value that can be returned by AfterEverything method to inform IDD that objects passed to the method were modified and neeed to be reloaded.
      static String ROWID_OBJECT
      This is a value of system column ROWID_OBJECT.
      static String SAVE_IN_PENDING_STATE
      OperationContext property that defines whether data is being saved in "pending" state.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      OperationResult afterEverything(BDDObject savingObject)
      Called when BDD has successfully persisted data associated with Composite Save operation and successfully committed database transaction.
      OperationResult afterSave(BDDObject savedObject)
      Called when BDD has successfully persisted data associated with Composite Save operation but database transaction is not yet committed, so it is possible to rollback all changes.
      OperationResult beforeEverything(BDDObject savingObject)
      Called before the Composite Save operation is started.
      OperationResult beforeSave(BDDObject savingObject)
      Called when BDD starts to persist data as part of Composite Save operation.

      • Methods inherited from interface com.siperian.bdd.userexits.operations.IBaseOperationPlugin

        getOperationContext, getOperationType

    • Field Detail

      • NEED_REFRESH_OBJECT

        static final OperationResult NEED_REFRESH_OBJECT
        Value that can be returned by AfterEverything method to inform IDD that objects passed to the method were modified and neeed to be reloaded.

      • SAVE_IN_PENDING_STATE

        static final String SAVE_IN_PENDING_STATE
        OperationContext property that defines whether data is being saved in "pending" state.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • INTERACTION_ID

        static final String INTERACTION_ID
        OperationContext property that defines SIF interaction ID. In Task context: SIF interaction ID is always accessible in both beforeSave(com.siperian.bdd.userexits.datamodel.BDDObject) and afterSave(com.siperian.bdd.userexits.datamodel.BDDObject) methods. Outside Task context: SIF interaction ID is only accessible in afterSave(com.siperian.bdd.userexits.datamodel.BDDObject) method
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • ROWID_OBJECT

        static final String ROWID_OBJECT
        This is a value of system column ROWID_OBJECT. For not new object it repeats value of the system column ROWID_OBJECT For new object it is empty in beforeSave and contains newly assigned value in afterSave
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Method Detail

      • beforeSave

        OperationResult beforeSave(BDDObject savingObject)

        Called when BDD starts to persist data as part of Composite Save operation. Any changes done by this method to HUB data may not be immediately synched with BDD appliation. This type of operation supports the following return codes:

        • OperationExecutionErrorType.ERROR

        Note:Multiple instance of OperationExecutionErrorType.ERROR can be returned through OperatoinResult. They will be displayed all together in a single message dialog.

        Transaction type:TRANSACTIONAL

        Parameters:
        savingObject - - reference to object that is about to be saved
        Returns:
        OperationResult instance.
        See Also:
        OperationResult

      • afterSave

        OperationResult afterSave(BDDObject savedObject)

        Called when BDD has successfully persisted data associated with Composite Save operation but database transaction is not yet committed, so it is possible to rollback all changes.

        The code implementing this method operates with read-only data BDDObject and can perform data verification. The result of verification should be communicated through OperationResult. This type of operation supports the following return codes:

        • OperationExecutionErrorType.ERROR

        Note:Multiple instance of OperationExecutionErrorType.ERROR can be returned through OperatoinResult. They will be displayed all together in a single message dialog.

        Transaction type:TRANSACTIONAL

        Parameters:
        savedObject - - reference to object that has been saved
        Returns:
        OperationResult instance.
        See Also:
        OperationResult

      • beforeEverything

        OperationResult beforeEverything(BDDObject savingObject)
        Called before the Composite Save operation is started. Can perform data verification and return code that will stop the Save operation with an error. Is suitable for composite validation and augmentation. Executed before the Search for Duplicates operation. This type of operation supports the following return codes:
        • OperationExecutionErrorType.ERROR
        • OperationExecutionErrorType.WARNING
        • OperationExecutionErrorType.CONFIRMATION
        Notes:
        • Multiple instance of OperationExecutionErrorType.ERROR or OperationExecutionErrorType.WARNING can be returned through OperatoinResult. They will be displayed all together in a single message dialog.
        • OperationExecutionErrorType.CONFIRMATION must be the only returned message. Otherwise it will be ignored.
        Parameters:
        savingObject - - reference to object that is about to be saved
        Returns:
        OperationResult instance.
        See Also:
        OperationResult

      • afterEverything

        OperationResult afterEverything(BDDObject savingObject)

        Called when BDD has successfully persisted data associated with Composite Save operation and successfully committed database transaction. It is suitable for any operations to be performed outside the transaction. This type of operation supports the following return codes:

        • OperationExecutionErrorType.WARNING an informational message at the end of the operation.

        Note:Multiple instance of OperationExecutionErrorType.WARNING can be returned through OperatoinResult. They will be displayed all together in a single message dialog.

        Transaction type:NON TRANSACTIONAL

        Parameters:
        savingObject - - reference to object that has been saved
        Returns:
        OperationResult instance. Return NEED_REFRESH_OBJECT to indicate that savingObject has been modified by means of SIF API and need to be reloaded.
        See Also:
        OperationResult
